data.title: Historical Elections Data
data.text:
​Ballot Order

Listing of candidates for Places 3 that are in the runoff election.

​Final Ballot Order

Listing of all qualified candidates in their respective ballot order. (As of Feb. 27, 2023)

​Candidate Listing

Listing of all candidates who have applied for a place on the ballot for the May 6, 2023 General Election.

​Ballot Order

Listing of candidates for Places 4,7,9,14, and 15 (Mayor) that are in the runoff

electionCandidate Calendar (Revised 5/2/19)

Pertinent dates for the candidate are listed on this calendar.​Candidate Filing

Listing of all candidates who have applied for a place on the ballot for the

May 4, 2019 General Election.​Candidate Calendar (Revised 5/2/19)

Pertinent dates for the candidate are listed on this calendar. ​Ballot Order

Listing of candidates for Place 4 that are in the runoff election.​Candidate Listing

This filing period for Place 04 in the November 6, 2018 Special Election Call it

ended August 23, 2018. The ballot drawing to determine the order of names in the

ballot was held on Monday, August 27, 2018 at 10am (Flag Room, Dallas City Hall).
